daily_plan_req: Maria Lopez spends all day in the Dentistry Consulation Room diagnosing patients.
name: Maria Lopez
learned: Maria Lopez is a dentist working in the Dentistry Consulation Room in the Hospital. She always listens to the patients and diagnosis them based on their symptoms and test results.
